00105 int Champ_Fonc_Q1_PolyMAC::imprime(Sortie& os, int ncomp) const
00106 {
00107   const Zone_dis_base& zone_dis = zone_dis_base();
00108   const Zone& zone = zone_dis.zone();
00109   const DoubleTab& coord=zone.domaine().coord_sommets();
00110   const int nb_som = zone.domaine().nb_som();
00111   const DoubleTab& val = valeurs();
00112   int som;
00113   os << nb_som << finl;
00114   for (som=0; som<nb_som; som++)
00115     {
00116       if (dimension==3)
00117         os << coord(som,0) << " " << coord(som,1) << " " << coord(som,2) << " " ;
00118       if (dimension==2)
00119         os << coord(som,0) << " " << coord(som,1) << " " ;
00120       if (nb_compo_ == 1)
00121         os << val(som) << finl;
00122       else
00123         os << val(som,ncomp) << finl;
00124     }
00125   os << finl;
00126   Cout << "Champ_Fonc_Q1_PolyMAC::imprime FIN >>>>>>>>>> " << finl;
00127   return 1;
00128 }
